kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Thanks Sean for outlining this!
For those starting a new project, the [XperienceCommunity Baseline V2](https://github.com/KenticoDevTrev/XperienceCommunity.Baseline) has been updated to Refresh 11 (hotfix 130) .net 8, and is ready for usage (and not **without** jQuery)!
If you're using V1 baseline you can read the [upgrade doc](https://github.com/KenticoDevTrev/XperienceCommunity.Baseline/blob/master/Version2ChangeLogAndMigration.md) to see the small changes.
